languages.text: If the {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g} has 8 or more stacks of {g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}bloodblessed{/g}, they gain +1 AP and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} si el portador no usa {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} del Culto de la Muerte tiene 8 acumulaciones o más de {g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}bendecido por la sangre{/g}, gana +1 PA y +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataque por turno{/g}. languages.text: {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}デスカルト・アサシン{/g}が{g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}ブラッドブレスド{/g}を8スタック以上持っている場合、AP+1と{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}各ターンの攻撃回数{/g} +1を得る。 基本アーマー特性：使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}カバー{/g}の中にいる場合、 {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}回避{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}受け流し{/g} +10%。
languages.original_text: If the {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g} has 8 or more stacks of {g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}bloodblessed{/g}, they gain +1 AP and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: デスカルト・{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}が{g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}ブラッドブレスド{/g}を8スタック以上持っている場合、AP+1と{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}各ターンの攻撃回数{/g} +1を得る。 基本アーマー特性：使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}カバー{/g}の中にいる場合、 {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}回避{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}受け流し{/g} +10%。

languages.text: 当{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}拥有至少8层{g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}血佑{/g}效果时，每回合都会额外获得1点行动点数与{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻击次数{/g}。 基础护甲特性：当装备者不在{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}后面时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高10%。
languages.original_text: If the {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g} has 8 or more stacks of {g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}bloodblessed{/g}, they gain +1 AP and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当拜死教{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}拥有至少8层{g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}血佑{/g}效果时，每回合都会额外获得1点行动点数与{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻击次数{/g}。 基础护甲特性：当装备者不在{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}后面时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高10%。

languages.text: Si l'{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}assassin du culte de la mort{/g} a au moins 8 cumuls de {g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}Béni par le sang{/g}, il gagne +1 PA et +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaque par tour{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} si le porteur n'est pas {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}à couvert{/g}.

Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassin{/g} du culte de la mort a au moins 8 cumuls de {g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}Béni par le sang{/g}, il gagne +1 PA et +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaque par tour{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} si le porteur n'est pas {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}à couvert{/g}.

languages.text: Hat der {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Todeskult-Assassine{/g} 8 oder mehr Stapel {g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}Blutsegen{/g}, erhält er +1 AP und +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriff pro Runde{/g}. Rüstung-Grundeigenschaft: +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}, wenn der Träger nicht in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} ist.

traits.locale_text: Hat der Todeskult-{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} 8 oder mehr Stapel {g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}Blutsegen{/g}, erhält er +1 AP und +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriff pro Runde{/g}. Rüstung-Grundeigenschaft: +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}, wenn der Träger nicht in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} ist.

languages.text: Если у {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}ассасина культа смерти{/g} 8 или более уровней эффекта {g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}багряное благословение{/g}, он получает +1 ОД и +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атаку в ход{/g}. Базовое свойство: +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}, если персонаж не защищен {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g}.
